texts.name: Marzum
texts.biography: Marzum made his name as a sadistic and influential nabob by constantly exploiting his servants. It is said that there is nothing he loves more than a sound of the whip cracking on human skin.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Whippers or Overseers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills for each level attained after 1st level.
specialty.name: Whippers
